message: Just before starting to launch an attack, General Ortholion moves and disarms you with a single blow.
You'd better be telling me the truth. I will report it later.

replies.text: Have you seen a guy with a cloak around here?
Yeah, whatever. We will talk later.

message:
MINERS: This zone has been declared unstable. No further excavating is allowed.

Signed by Guthbered of Prim.
You try to pull off the armor first but you soon discover both the man and the armor itself are covered by that glowing ore. You instantly stop grabbing it. The glowing ore is somehow growing.
